Instance.description: Change the plex exterior when enacted.

TunableList.name: enact_exterior_house_descriptions
TunableList.description: When enacted, a reference to the HouseDescription resource to use to select the Lot Template. Leaving unset makes no change on enact. The Street's Zones are matched to find which House Descriptions should be applied. Only Zones that have matching Lot Descriptions and are on the current Street will be modified.

TunableList.name: repeal_exterior_house_descriptions
TunableList.description: When repealed, a reference to the HouseDescription resource to use to select the Lot Template. Leaving unset makes no change on repeal. The Street's Zones are matched to find which House Descriptions should be applied. Only Zones that have matching Lot Descriptions and are on the current Street will be modified.
